events.title: Howard Hughes crashes his prototype Hughes XF-11 plane

movie.title: The Aviator
movie.plot: A biopic depicting the life of filmmaker and aviation pioneer Howard Hughes from 1927 to 1947, during which time he became a successful film producer and an aviation magnate, while simultaneously growing more unstable due to severe obsessive-compulsive disorder.

studios.title: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. 3. Produktions KG

events.title: Ellsworth "Bumpy" Johnson dies of heart failure

movie.title: American Gangster
movie.plot: Following the death of his employer and mentor, Bumpy Johnson, Frank Lucas establishes himself as the number one importer of heroin in the Harlem district of Manhattan. He does so by buying heroin directly from the source in South East Asia and he comes up with a unique way of importing the drugs into the United States. Partly based on a true story.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 13 wins & 35 nominations.

movie.title: Cazuza: Time Doesn't Stop
movie.plot: Inspired by the moving book “Só as Mães São Felizes”, by Lucinha Araújo, Cazuza's mother, the film covers a little more than 10 years of the singer’s crazy and brief life – from the beginning of his career in the Circo Voador venue, in 1981, to the huge success and the apotheosis of his shows with the Barão Vermelho band, his solo career, his relations with his parents, friends, lovers and passions, and the courage he had to face his final years, with HIV, until his death, in 1990.

events.mention: poster advertising reopening of the park

movie.title: We Bought a Zoo
movie.plot: Benjamin has lost his wife and, in a bid to start his life over, purchases a large house that has a zoo – welcome news for his daughter, but his son is not happy about it. The zoo is in need of renovation and Benjamin sets about the work with the head keeper and the rest of the staff, but, the zoo soon runs into financial trouble.
